# Advanced Remote Index ‚Äî Minecraft 1.21.11 Fabric Mod Development

This index provides categorized, searchable links for mod developers working with Minecraft 1.21.11 and Fabric. Use this as your launchpad for API docs, guides, wiki definitions, and advanced modding topics.

---

## üîç How to Use

- **Search:** Use browser search (Ctrl+F) or VS Code search to quickly find topics.
- **Categories:** Links are grouped by topic for fast navigation.
- **Fabric-Specific:** All links are for Minecraft 1.21.11 and Fabric modding unless noted.
- **Tips:** Bookmark this file or add to your project wiki for instant access.

---

## üìö API & JavaDocs

- [Fabric Loader API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-loader-0.18.4/)
- [Fabric API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-api-0.141.3+1.21.11/)
- [Fabric Yarn API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/yarn-1.21.11+build.4/)
